name: wol
tagline: A simple Wake on LAN control tool
description: wol is a small self-hosted tool for sending Wake-on-LAN packets to machines on your network. It provides a simple interface to store hosts and wake them remotely, making remote power management easier for homelab setups.

features.title: Host Storage
features.description: Save device MAC addresses and friendly names for repeated wake operations

features.title: Magic Packet Sending
features.description: Transmit Wake-on-LAN packets to power on compatible network devices remotely

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Use CLI commands for scripting and automation alongside the web interface

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Minimal resource footprint suitable for running on low-power devices
